ValidationRule.description: If 60, 75, or 90 selected, must complete Approval and select Approver
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'invoicing', ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Invoicing'), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'New') || ISPICKVAL(Status, 'New - Assigned')), OR( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Terms__c, '60'), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Terms__c, '75'), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Terms__c, '90') ), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Terms__c, ''), $Setup.Validation_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Complete Approval And Select Approver
